Synopsis:
"Captain America: The First Avenger" will focus on the early days of the Marvel Universe when Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) volunteers to participate in a pilot program that becomes the super soldier known as Captain America.

As Captain America, Rogers joins Bucky Barnes (Sebastian Stan) and Peggy Carter (Hayley Atwell) to make war on the evil organization HYDRA, led by the villainous Red Skull (Hugo Weaving).

Production notes:
- Adaptation of 'Captain America' patriotic superhero created by Joe Simon and Jack Kirby for Marvel Comics in 1941 and resurrected in 1964.
